application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by condition nos. 3j, l and o (submission of details - (j) a plan depicting new cornices and cornices for retention. 1:5 sections of all new cornices. Photographs to be included of any existing reference material. A methodology for the replication of any existing cornices; (l) a method statement for the restoration of any historic cornices. A sample should be agreed with the Design & Heritage Officer prior to submission of the condition; (o) a method statement, 1:10 elevations and 1:5 sections, existing and proposed, of the relocated cupboard from ground floor to first to be provided, highlighting retained fabric, any fabric to be lost, and any new fabric to be inserted.) of listed building consent 24/00852 (Internal alterations; construction of a single storey rear extension; alteration to fenestration.)
